    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(float width,
             float height)
        Creates a new dude at the origin. The size is expressed in physics units NOT pixels. In order for drawing to work properly, you MUST set the drawScale. The drawScale converts the physics units to pixels.
        Parameters:
        width - The object width in physics units
        height - The object width in physics units

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(float x,
             float y,
             float width,
             float height)
        Creates a new dude avatar at the given position. The size is expressed in physics units NOT pixels. In order for drawing to work properly, you MUST set the drawScale. The drawScale drawing to work properly, you MUST set the drawScale. The drawScaled converts the physics units to pixels.
        Parameters:
        x - Initial x position of the avatar center
        y - Initial y position of the avatar center
        width - The object width in physics units
        height - The object width in physics units

      • activatePhysics

        public boolean activatePhysics(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world)
        Creates the physics Body(s) for this object, adding them to the world. This method overrides the base method to keep your ship from spinning.
        Overrides:
        activatePhysics in class SimpleObstacle
        Parameters:
        world - Box2D world to store body
        Returns:
        true if object allocation succeeded

      • applyForce

        public void applyForce()
        Applies the force to the body of this dude This method should be called after the force attribute is set.
